overview:
CEO @ AssetGlobe

Before starting AssetGlobe, Luiz worked for 5 years at a leading industrial asset management, auctioneer and valuation company in several positions in corporate strategy, marketing and business operations.

His last role was Director of Operations Asia-Pacific, managing the disposal of surplus industrial assets for major multinationals in the Automotive, Pharmaceuticals and Electronics sectors.

Prior to that Luiz worked as Senior Software Engineer/System Architect, designing high performance Customer Care & Billing Systems (CC&BS) for some of the leading mobile operators in Europe, North America and Brazil.

Luiz began his career as a Software Developer, working with information security.

Luiz has an MBA in Business Administration from London Business School, UK and a BSc in Computer Science from Federal University of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
